Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hi all,

Myself and a couple other guys are performing a complete overhaul of JNeat.
 One thing that always seems to be under foot is the concept of Traits.
 Ken's documentation mentions that these were installed for some future
purposes.  I'm curious what became of them, and specifically if they are now
considered to be an important feature of the NEAT algorithm.  If we
permitted ourselves to purge them from JNeat, would they be missed?

Regards,
Daniel

--000e0cd7223033616a047d87c4cf
Content-Type: text/html; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
